This file contains the current submodule version (if it has one) and info on where to find release information about the submodule.

* This file needs updating when a submodule is updated! *

gRPC:
 - Version: 1.25.0 plus our patches on top
 - Repo: https://github.com/CanonicalLtd/grpc.git
 - Upstream release URL: https://github.com/grpc/grpc/releases

libssh:
 - Verison: 0.9.3 plus our patches on top
 - Repo: https://github.com/CanonicalLtd/libssh.git
 - Upstream release URL: https://www.libssh.org/

fmt:
 - Version: 6.1.2
 - Repo: https://github.com/fmtlib/fmt.git
 - Upstream release URL: https://github.com/fmtlib/fmt/releases

QHotKey:
 - Version: 1.2.2 plus 3 fixes on master
 - Repo: https://github.com/Skycoder42/QHotkey.git
 - Upstream release URL: https://github.com/Skycoder42/QHotkey/releases

scope_guard:
 - Version: 0.2.3 plus 5 commits from master
 - Repo: https://github.com/ricab/scope_guard.git
 - Upstream release URL: https://github.com/ricab/scope_guard/releases

semver:
 - Version: 1.0.0 plus patches on top
 - Repo: https://github.com/CanonicalLtd/semver.git
 - Upstream release URL: https://github.com/zmarko/semver/releases

xz-embedded:
 - Version: No version
 - Repo: https://git.tukaani.org/xz-embedded.git
 - Upstream release URL: None but website is https://tukaani.org/xz/embedded.html

yaml-cpp:
 - Version: 0.6.3
 - Repo: https://github.com/jbeder/yaml-cpp.git
 - Upstream release URL: https://github.com/jbeder/yaml-cpp/releases
